abstract: The draft document from the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation expands the ban on proprietary trading by banks, but it leaves many details to be determined.
snippet: The draft document from the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation expands the ban on proprietary trading by banks, but it leaves many details to be determined.

headline.main: Details Emerge on Draft of Volcker Rule
headline.print_headline: Details Emerge on Draft Of Volcker Rule Proposal
